summary: Build ATTENDEASE, an e-attendance app with phone-number/password authentication for teachers and parents, teacher dashboards for managing classes/students and taking attendance, and parent views for attendance stats with updates when attendance is taken.
architectural_notes: Link parent accounts to student records via phone number captured when teacher adds the student.
Attendance data model should support totals, absences, and percentage calculations, and per-class/per-date records.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- App logo mark with a clean attendance/check motif, warm neutral palette (attendease-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero banner illustration with teacher and parent silhouettes and a simple class checklist motif (attendease-hero.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create the ATTENDEASE app shell with a clear landing page that explains two roles (Teacher and Parent) and provides navigation to Sign Up and Log In for each role.
Implement phone number + password sign up and log in for two roles (Teacher and Parent), including validation and secure password handling (store salted hash, never store plaintext passwords).
After login, route users to role-specific dashboards: Teacher Dashboard for teachers and Parent Dashboard for parents; protect routes so users cannot access the other role’s pages.
Teacher Dashboard: allow teachers to create, view, and manage classes (at minimum: create class with a name; list existing classes).
Teacher Dashboard: within a selected class, allow teachers to add and manage students, capturing at minimum: student name and the parent phone number used to link that student to a parent account.

Attendance taking flow: enable teachers to select a class and date, mark each student Present/Absent, and submit attendance; saving should be idempotent for the same class+date (update existing record instead of duplicating).

Parent Dashboard: after parent login, show the list of students linked by matching the parent’s phone number to students’ stored parent phone number; allow selecting a student to view attendance metrics: attendance percentage, total sessions recorded, total present, and total absent.
Ensure parents can see attendance updates after a teacher submits attendance by automatically refreshing parent views on a short interval while the parent dashboard is open (polling).

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme for ATTENDEASE (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently across landing, auth, teacher dashboard, attendance, and parent dashboard screens (avoid a blue/purple default look).
Generate and include static image assets for branding and render them in the frontend from static files (do not serve images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: App identity: create e-attendance app named 'ATTENDEASE'
Authentication: teachers and parents can create accounts and log in using phone number + password
Roles/portals: separate teacher and parent experiences after login
Teacher dashboard: add/manage students, including storing a parent phone number used to link parent login to the student
Attendance taking: teachers can record attendance for students in a class
Parent dashboard: view student attendance metrics (percentage, total attendance, absences, etc.)
Attendance updates: when a teacher takes attendance, parents can see updated attendance on their phone

Implement backend data models and persistence for: users (teacher/parent), classes (owned by teacher), students (belonging to a class), and attendance records (per class session date, per student present/absent).
